metadata.title: USN-5380-1 -- Bash vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Bash did not properly drop privileges when the binary had the setuid bit enabled. An attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5380-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  bash-builtins - 5.0-6ubuntu1.2 bash-doc - 5.0-6ubuntu1.2 bash-static - 5.0-6ubuntu1.2 bash - 5.0-6ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
